item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

item.title: Coming soon
item.description: ConsultFirst is a platform built by consultants. Our goal is to make it incredibly easy for clients to discover and engage with experts across a multitude of disciplines. With a few clicks, you can find the perfect consultant tailored to your specific needs. Our streamlined process means you don’t have to worry about the old and disconnected tools that you are used to. You will do what you do best, and we handle the rest.

item.title: Contact
item.description: To contact us, please email info@consultfirst.io
